>Takasugi is shishi which has many fans even now.
>If I confess honestly, I like him most on Ishin-shish side.

Watashi mo Takasugi Shinsaku ga suki desu.

Truth be told, the only people I really like/respect in any amount on the 
Ishin Shishi side are Katsura, Takasugi, and Ryoma. Katsura because to me it 
seems his conscience wasn't disabled, unlike some other people 
*cough*Saigou*cough*, Takasugi because he's just cool, and Ryoma because 
he's just so darn hard to figure out-- although it annoys me that he was so 
full of himself.

--M.
